issue.title: Trusty: remote_endpoint: Transport endpoint is not connected

content.raw:
I tested on my machine (Gazebo compiled from `default` branch) and using the proposed package solves the problem, both the one with the yarp specific system plugin [I mentioned before](#!/osrf/gazebo/issue/1204/trusty-remote_endpoint-transport-endpoint#comment-10659464) and the one that occurs when launching `gzclient --verbose` without any server running. 

By the way, on the Ubuntu bug they link a proposed `boost-mpi` package, I guess it is just an error, right?
content.html:
I tested on my machine (Gazebo compiled from default branch) and using the proposed package solves the problem, both the one with the yarp specific system plugin I mentioned before and the one that occurs when launching gzclient --verbose without any server running.

By the way, on the Ubuntu bug they link a proposed boost-mpi package, I guess it is just an error, right?
